Day 19

Today’s Progress

More MongoDB lessons. I’ve refactored the MongoDB code with Mongoose.

Thoughts

Not a lot to show for today, but I did learn more about Mongoose, and refactored my previous code using Mongoose.

I’ve added my first POST request to the API, which is now wired up to the database, as opposed to console.log’ing the body to the screen.

More Mongoose tomorrow, which I’m looking forward to.

My only concern is that I’m not spending enough time going over what I have learned, I’m forgetting stuff that I learned 2 days ago already!

I’m also worried that if I spend some time going over a design course, I’ll start forgetting the Node, Express and MongoDB stuff.
